items.sentence: I went to the beach with Tom and his friends.
I wish I could afford to buy a car like that.
I wish I could speak French the way Tom does.
Tom is a suspect in a homicide investigation.
Tom is allowed to do whatever he wants to do.
Tom is almost never at home on Monday, is he?
Tom is alone in his office, writing a report.
Maybe you should take the children somewhere.
Most people need more love than they deserve.
Mother Teresa was born in Yugoslavia in 1910.
My father bought me a camera for my birthday.
My father complained about the traffic noise.
Tom thought that Mary wouldn\'t have to sing.
Tom grew up speaking both English and French.
The only person Tom wants to talk to is Mary.
Tom didn\'t know what he\'d be allowed to do.
Tom is pretty sure that Mary won\'t be there.
I wanted to help you, but Tom told me not to.
I warned Tom not to eat anything Mary cooked.
I think Tom is a lot better swimmer than you.
